availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Davidson County, Tennessee, comptroller. Tennessee native. Married to Martha S. Spense Dunlap in Davidson County on August 15, 1855. Comptroller of the Treasury of Tennessee in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Davidson County, District 10, p.
Federal Mortality Census Schedules, 1850-1880, and Related Indexes, 1850-1880, NARA RG, Microfilm Series T655, Roll 28, Davidson County, Tennessee, 1879, (Accessed via Ancestry.com).
